dict.acceptation: 围栏；轨道，钢轨；扶手；[动]秧鸡；
将…围起来；铺铁轨；坐火车旅行；用围栏围；

sent.orig: Tai Wai Station will serve as an interchange station between MOS Rail and East Rail.
sent.trans: 大围站将会是马铁和东铁的交汇站。

sent.orig: V CMOS operational amplifier with rail-to-rail input and output ranges.
sent.trans: 5V电压下、具有全摆幅输入与输出功能的两级CMOS运算放大器。

sent.orig: All girders shipped by rail were arranged on a flatbed rail car.
sent.trans: 由火车装运的所有主梁都安放在平板火车车皮上。

sent.orig: Adopting light rail, rail, superior quality, greatly shorten installation period.
sent.trans: 采用轻轨导轨，质量保证，安装简便，大大缩短安装工期。

sent.orig: It connects Light Rail Transit terminus and West Rail Station at the first floor.
sent.trans: 在一楼连接轻便铁路总站及西铁站。
